name: Phase 100
details:
DESCRIPTION
• Big brother of the Phase 90 with a broader range of sounds
• Four-position rotary switch selects four preset waveforms
• Spacey, psychedelic ambience for guitar solos or chords
POWER 
One 9-volt battery (remove bottom plate to install) or a 9-volt AC adapter.
SPECIFICATIONS
Input Impedance: 500 kΩ
Output Impedance: 3 kΩ
Maximum Intput Level: +5 dB 
Maximum Output Level: +8 dB
Noise Floor*: 95 dBV 
Phase Shift Range: 180 Degrees  
Bypass: Hardwire
Current Draw: 6 mA 
Power Supply: 9 volts DC 
https://www.jimdunlop.com/product/m107-7-10137-00656-0.do?
